import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import './SearchResults.css'; const SearchResults = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const location = useLocation(); const query = new URLSearchParams(location.search).get('query') || ''; // R√©cup√©rer la requ√™te depuis l'URL const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(query); const handleSearch = () => { if (searchTerm.trim()) { navigate(`/results?query=${encodeURIComponent(searchTerm)}`); } }; return (
{/* Barre de recherche en haut */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} className="search-input" placeholder="Search for education" />
